name: Cindy Carolina Delgado
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Hope all is well with you today. I am writing to express my interest in your current opening for a Budtender. Please accept my resume into your consideration, which I have enclosed for your review. Contains additional information of my professional expertise. I look forward to the opportunity to meet with you to discuss the qualifications I would bring to your organization. Thank you.
 
Sincerely,

Cindy C Delgado

Open and close cash register, performing task such as counting money, separating charge slips, coupons and vouchers. Balancing cash drawers and making deposits. Verifying age of customer if they purchase alcohol or cigarettes. Activate fuel pump, prepared food make coffee also sell food and grocery items. Operate car wash, stock stage beverages and products.

Participate in sales and marketing activities for the purpose of meeting branch sales goals and objects. Data entry,filing paperwork, scanning, printing, and making orders for clients.
